entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Huntsville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:51 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 04:12 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.2°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -16.8°C
Wind: SSE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
